name: Picnic Peril
description:
Ants have keen senses of smell and grow incredibly fast. Combine the unique abilities of various foods to strategize and engage in a battle of wits with the ants! Will you distract the ants with the Half-Baked to lure them elsewhere, or set up Dan The Meat Can for defense? Go all out in this caloric colosseum!



Unlock ten cute and unique food characters, each with their special abilities. From Tako who squirts ink to Heath who dazes ants, you will enjoy getting to know their adorable appearances and interesting personalities. Try your best to unlock them all! By combining different character abilities, each level contains endless opportunities for strategic play!



This turn-based strategy game offers rich gameplay content, including 40+ different levels and various environments, bringing you different tactical challenges. Each level has unique challenges and objectives, requiring you to carefully plan each move, taking advantage of the terrain and each character’s special ability to overcome the Ant hoard. As the game progresses, the map layouts will become more complex, demanding continuous adjustment to your strategies to succeed. Star-rated levels; can you obtain them all?



Game Features:
  • 10+ Super cute and delicious food, check out their stories!
  • 44 carefully crafted brain-burning levels, let our brains and taste buds dance together!
  • Large picnic map, cherry trees, lavender bushes, wheat waves, please choose your place to enjoy the spring.
  • Mouse click and drag to complete the operation, easy peasy!
  • Relaxing music, let your brain spin ~
